job.title: Senior Software Engineer - C / C++ / Python
job.description: We are a rapidly growing autonomy and robotics technology company that has been in business for over 20 years We are transforming government and commercial transportation with programs that include selfdriving cars and trucks autonomous shuttles UAV UAS and drones As we grow our team we are looking for passionate people who want to build longterm careers with
